SENT.plain: After emphasizing that the treatment of a strawberry naevus in a newborn is usually unnecessary, the author shows the value of the Sonar Doppler in delimiting the extent of pseudovaricose and cavernous, venous angiomas
Arterio-venous fistulas above a certain size can be localized by this procedure
On the other hand, the delicate arteriovenous fistulas found in cases of the Klippel and Trenaunay triad are inaccessible to this procedure
